thread.section_title: Clothes2order.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clothes2order.com | 7 of 316
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: Great choice of t shirts and more, colours, styles etc. Easy to upload artwork and design. Very fast turnaround, but Clothes2Order's designers consulted me on a change that was needed, and as I was up against a deadline, I really appreciated all this. The finished articles are brilliant, and loved by all (against expectations) and the whole process was excellent from start to finish. I will be coming back for more!
